description: Today's Chip of the Day is inspired by Egwin of Evesham - the 12th-century English Benedictine monk who was known for his culinary skills and contributions to monastic life.

Event: Last Day of the Year or Bispers ng Bagong Tan (Philippines)
Chip: Salt & Vinegar

As we bid farewell to another year and prepare for the new dawn, let our Salt & Vinegar kettle chips be your perfect companion.
event_name: Last Day of the Year or Bisperás ng Bagong Taón, special holiday between Rizal Day and New Year's Day (Philippines)

description:
Event: Global Family Day (Celebrating Unity and Diversity)
Chip: Teriyaki

Join us in celebrating Global Family Day, which honors our interconnectedness across cultures.
